name: Altidudes
description:
Altidudes is an infinite climber about dudes skateboarding up the tallest mountain in the world, while trying to avoid obstacles and get the highest score!

FEATURES
- A combination of infinite runners and platformers but still not quite able to fit into one genre.
- Beautiful art created pixel by pixel and inspired by your favorite arcade games of yesteryear
- Tubular 8-bit tunes by Bert Cole that will keep you coming back for more!
- Jump, dodge, and slide your way up an impossibly tall mountain
- Unlock and choose from a variety of dudes to play as!
- Beat your high score again and again!
- Play one-handed!


Thanks for checking it out dudes and dudettes!
